import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import EditProfile from "./EditProfile" const ProfileListItem = ({profile})=> { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const profiles = useSelector(state => state.profiles); return ( <>
{profile.fullName}
{profile.tweet}
Edit Profile

{profile.firstName}{profile.lastName}

{profile.fullName}
{profile.handle}
{profile.bio}
{profile.location} {profile.dob} {profile.dateJoined}
{profile.followingCount} Following {profile.followersCount} Followers
); }; export default ProfileListItem;
